name: Am I in another game? (Trailer)
description:
Prequel: Am I in a game? (play it first if you haven’t)

A short trailer of a possible sequel to Am I in a game.

Yes, it’s short. Really.

Oh, and there’s nothing behind the rock.

FAQ

If the attributions above is that long, is the game... I mean the trailer, really that short?

Of course.
